dashboard.label: Cron Toolkit - Scheduled Search Analysis
dashboard.description: Analyze cron schedules on saved searches.

search.query: | rest /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches splunk_server=local search="disabled=0" search="is_scheduled=1" | fields title eai:acl.app cron_schedule | rename eai:acl.app as app, title as search_name, cron_schedule as schedule | eval end=relative_time(now(), "+7d@d"), start=relative_time(now(), "-7d@d") | croncountruns schedule=schedule end=end start=start | fields search_name app schedule trigger_count | sort - trigger_count
